items.title: Linting Passed
items.description: Run `ddev pnpm lint` and verify it completes with zero errors and warnings

items.title: Code Formatting Applied
items.description: Ensure consistent formatting across all files by running `ddev pnpm format`

items.title: No Console Logs in Production
items.description: Remove all console.log statements or properly gate them so they don't run in production

items.title: Successful Production Build
items.description: Run `pnpm run build` and verify it completes without any errors or warnings

items.title: Environment Variables
items.description: All required environment variables are properly configured for both build and runtime environments, and documented in .env.example

items.title: Create Migration Files
items.description: Run `ddev pnpm payload migrate:create` to generate any required database migration files

items.title: Lighthouse Scores (Mobile)
items.description: Achieve Performance score > 75, Accessibility > 90, Best Practices > 90, and SEO > 90 on mobile devices
items.extra: Run tests against staging or production environments. Do not use development environments like 'next dev' as they will skew results.

items.title: Meta Tags Verification
items.description: Verify all pages have proper meta tags, titles, and Open Graph data. Use tools like 'check-site-meta' to validate

items.title: Image Optimization
items.description: Ensure all images use the Next.js Image component with proper sizing attributes

items.title: Sitemap Generation
items.description: Verify the XML sitemap is automatically generated at /sitemap_index.xml and includes all important pages

items.title: Sitemap Accessibility
items.description: Confirm the robots.txt file correctly points to the sitemap and that search engines can access it

items.title: Favicon
items.description: Verify the favicon file has been updated with the version provided by the designer or client

items.title: Sensitive Data Exposure
items.description: Verify no API keys or sensitive data are exposed to the client-side code

items.title: Cross-Browser Testing
items.description: Test the application in all major browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge

items.title: Mobile Responsiveness
items.description: Verify the layout functions correctly and looks good on mobile devices

items.title: HTML Lang Attribute
items.description: Verify the HTML lang attribute (on the html element) is correctly set to match the target audience region
